scripts.dev_build: cd ./rust_tetro && wasm-pack build --dev --target web && npm run copy_build
scripts.wasm_build: cd ./rust_tetro && wasm-pack build --release --target web && cp -r ./pkg ../dist/scripts/pkg && cd .. && rm ./dist/scripts/pkg/.gitignore
scripts.clear_tet_lib: rm -rf rust_tetro/ && rm -rf dist/scripts/pkg && rm -rf src/pkg
scripts.update_tet_lib: npm run clear_tet_lib && npm run get_tet_lib
scripts.update_local_lib: npm run clear_tet_lib && npm run get_local_lib
scripts.build: npm run update_tet_lib && npm run wasm_build && tsc
